resources.string:
This appliation is developed by the team of 3 students from Sheridan as the requirement of the course.

The app is to track the dollar earned and spent by the user. The application also provides an analysis to help users to estimate their expense and to save the earnings.


 Application Name: ExpenseTracker
 Group No: 07
 Group Members:
 Binod Shrestha(991462138
 Hemraj Kafle(9914511170)
 Saam Haghighat(991455311)
 School: Sheridan College 
 Course: PROG39402
